Entries.GreenFlagDude: This is incredible! /-5 305 272 306 307 308 807/Wow, this is pretty neat.//This is cringe.//This reminds me of the time my little brother drank a candle, are you as thick as him?/-4/I AM THE LORD OF DARKNESS.//

Entries.GreenFlagDude0: MARRIAGE IS AWESOME. I CANNOT WAIT. $4#$e# FOREVER LOVE.$1
Entries.GreenFlagDude1: I seriously can't believe I'm so lucky. $4#$e# Back on my home planet, we don't do weddings, so I never thought this would happen to me! $4

Time to brew!$h"/move farmer 0 -1 0/faceDirection farmer 1 true/faceDirection GreenFlagDude 3 true/pause 500/speak GreenFlagDude "Oh hey!" /quickQuestion "What brings you here?"#I wanted to see you#I smelled something good.(break)speak GreenFlagDude "Oh...I see...!$l"(break)speak GreenFlagDude "You have great sense of smell.$h"/speak GreenFlagDude "I'm brewing some coffee. If you want some, you'll have to wait until its is done."/pause 500/speak GreenFlagDude "How about while waiting for the coffee to finish, let me tell you some fun facts about coffee!#$b#Did you know that the most expensive coffee comes from elephant dung?$h"/emote farmer 16/emote GreenFlagDude 32/speak GreenFlagDude "Don't worry I didn't brew elephant dung. It's too expensive anyway.#$b#A good coffee doesn't have to be expensive."/question null "What should I ask him?#You seem passionate about coffee, why do you like it?#Tell me about yourself."/speak GreenFlagDude "I really love coffee and making coffee.#$b#The intricate process of brewing coffee makes me realize how small factors could have a big impact on the final outcome.#$b# And it does gives me the needed boost to get through the day.$h"/playSound crystal/pause 500/speak GreenFlagDude "Oh, coffee's done. Why don't you take a seat and let's have some coffee together?$h"/farmerEat 395/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "The coffee was excellent.
